title: Guild Settings
description: Here you can see a list of all the available settings, as well as what they are currently set too.

fields.name: prefix
fields.value:
The prefix that commands should use.

- Does not apply to slash commands (invoked by typing '/' in chat).

*default:* `!`

fields.name: â€‹skiplimit
fields.value:
The amount of people needed to skip the song that is currently playing.

- If the specified number is higher than the amount of people currently in the voice channel, everybody in the channel has to vote for a song to be skipped.
- If the specified number is negative, only users with the permission `manage server` can skip songs.

*default:* `1`

fields.name: shufflelimit
fields.value:
The amount of people needed to shuffle the queue.

- If the specified number is higher than the amount of people currently in the voice channel, everybody in the channel has to vote for the queue to be shuffled.
- If the specified number is negative, only users with the permission `manage server` can shuffle the queue.

*default:* `2`

fields.name: stoplimit
fields.value:
The amount of people needed to stop playback completely.

- If the specified number is higher than the amount of people currently in the voice channel, everybody in the channel has to vote for the bot to leave.
- If the specified number is negative, only users with the permission `manage server` can make the bot leave before the queue ends.

*default:* `-1`

footer.text: select one of the options when using the command to change it
